segments.text: The woman’s focus on that plate is almost hypnotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so absorbed in drying it that she doesn’t see the water flooding the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is getting wet, but she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s always this oblivious or if today is just an off day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are taking advantage of her distraction, and it’s frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically hanging from the cabinet, and the girl is just waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while everything around her is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, and it’s only a matter of time before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting to warn her, but she probably wouldn’t hear me anyway.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is absurd, and I don’t know whether to laugh or cry.
segments.speaker: PAR
